word:
Well, Sunday night I did not sleep after eleven o'clock. On Monday morning we left Healdsburg for St. Helena, and passed safely through the many changes that must be made in coming from Healdsburg to St. Helena by way of Oakland. We reached home about eight o'clock. I took a hot bath, and went to bed, 
                                                                           1805
but I did not sleep after eleven o'clock, and I rose at one.
